name: Atmos Power Delivery
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
Thank you for upgrading Warbeard's Slammin' Flammin' Kablammin' War Supplies' most risky investment, yet!
-
Do you like a fast paced work environment? Do you like having regularly changing co-workers to keep things fresh? Do you hate routines? Then have we got a job opportunity for you! Come down to Warbeard's Slammin' Flammin' Kablammin' War Supplies in Philita's Mining District for an interview! Curious to know how likely it is for you to get the job? Can you read this? Congratulations, new hire! Welcome, aboard!
-
-
Targets Single creature you are considered Connected with.
Requirements The path between your target and yourself is clear. Your target must be your size or smaller.
Effect Stand your ground and deliver your Connected target directly into your sword. Attempt an Athletics check against their Fortitude DC. If you are considered grabbed and pass the flat check to use a manipulate action, gain a +4 circumstance bonus to the Athletics check: 
Success You pull them to the square adjacent to you and you can attempt a melee Strike against the as part of the action, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to hit as well as adding one damage die to the attack damage on this Strike. This additional damage die is also doubled on a critical hit. 
Failure Your target does not move.
Critical Failure Your target doesn't move and your bolt releases, as if using *Atmos Release*.
